Nope.  Downloading and installing the textures from the website still result in no asphalt being displayed at the airport
How about a rip?  Other that that possibility, this torrent is useless.

If you previously used the Simflyers IAD scenery, open your scenery.cfg file with notepad and search for "Exclude=N38 59 08 27,W77 30 19 13,N38 54 46 73,W77 25 36 20,all"

Delete that line and the flatten entry below it.
